meanings.definition: Unpleasant or disgusting in taste or appearance
meanings.sent1: The spoiled milk was yuckier than the fresh milk.
meanings.sent2: The garbage had a yuckier smell than the flowers.
meanings.sent3: The yuckier the food looked, the more the dog wanted to eat it.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds made the sky look even yuckier.
meanings.sent5: The slimy texture of the snail was yuckier than expected.

meanings.definition: More unpleasant or disgusting than something else
meanings.sent1: The old socks were yuckier than the new ones.
meanings.sent2: The dirty pond water was yuckier after the storm.
meanings.sent3: The yuckier the joke, the louder everyone laughed.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house looked even yuckier in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The smell of rotten eggs was yuckier than anything she had ever experienced.
